body.p: In revising IAS 36, the Board considered the requirement in the previous version of IAS 36 for:

li.p: income tax receipts and payments to be excluded from the estimates of future cash flows used to measure value in use; and

the discount rate used to measure value in use to be a pre‑tax rate that reflects current market assessments of the time value of money and the risks specific to the asset for which the future cash flow estimates have not been adjusted.
